resources.string: 1 - Break Tasks Into Smaller Steps Large tasks can feel overwhelming. Divide them into smaller, manageable chunks and focus on one step at a time. There is a powerfull goblin magic in https://goblin.tools/

2 - Use Body Doubling, this is a good doppelganger usage. You can do either in person or in another helm (virtually, like YT). The presence of another person can help you stay on track and increase focus.
